In commission in Forder Creek, Saltash, Cornwall

Heron is a 2006 Memory 19 by Salterns of Poole. Substantially built in grp with teak woodwork and pine sole boards.

She is a fully rigged topsail gaff sloop

Since purchasing her in 2018 I have carried an extensive programme of maintenance and upgrading (see schedule for full details) including:
